welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nakuru, Kenya! Get ready to be charmed by the city's stunning landscapes, vibrant wildlife, and welcoming locals. Take your time to explore and enjoy all that Nakuru has to offer.

restaurants.name: KFC Nakuru
restaurants.description: KFC Nakuru is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Java Nakuru
restaurants.description: Java Nakuru is a café located in Nakuru.

restaurants.name: Rift Fries
restaurants.description: Rift Fries is a bbq joint located in Nakuru.
restaurants.address: opp Rift sports club (Inder Singh road), Nakuru

restaurants.name: Gilani's Restaurant
restaurants.description: Gilani's Restaurant is a african restaurant located in Nakuru.

restaurants.name: Kenchic Nakuru
restaurants.description: Kenchic Nakuru is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nakuru Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nakuru Airport is responsible for handling all air freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
